CustomField.description: Payment gateways are installed as external packages. If you have installed a payment gateway outside of Summit Events App you can add the name of it here. Follow the instructions of your gateway install.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Payment gateways are installed as external packages. If you have installed a payment gateway outside of Summit Events App you can add the name of it here. Follow the instructions of your gateway install.
CustomField.label: Payment Gateway
